## import data
```{r}
library(quantmod); library(tseries); library(forecast)
Kospi<-read.csv("/Users/jinseop/Desktop/funstuff/kospi.csv", header=T)
```
## head 
```{r}
head(Kospi)
str(Kospi)
```
```{r}
Kospi.price<-Kospi$Adj.Close; Kospi.vol<-Kospi$Volume; Kospi.price<-as.integer(Kospi.price)
Kospi.price<-Kospi.price[!is.na(Kospi.price)]
yield=NA
for(i in 2 :length(Kospi.price))
  yield[i]=(Kospi.price[i]-Kospi.price[i-1])/Kospi.price[i-1]
yield1<-cbind(yield,1:1226)
colnames(yield1)<-c("Yield","Day")
yield1<-as.data.frame(yield1)
```

```{r}
yield1; table(is.na(yield1))
mean(yield1$Yield, na.rm=T)->mean.y
```
